alert.note: Alert for Collin; Cooke; Denton; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 8:15PM CST until February 21 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Denton County in north central Texas... Northwestern Collin County in north central Texas... Southeastern Cooke County in north central Texas... Southwestern Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 915 PM CST. * At 813 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Fairview, or 7 miles southeast of Decatur, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... McKinney, Frisco, Denton, Sherman, Corinth, Sanger, Prosper, Celina, Krum, Pilot Point, Argyle, Shady Shores, Aubrey, Northlake, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Gunter, New Fairview, Dorchester and Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. This storm has a history of producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
